javelin.view

Class MapPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Panel
          • javelin.view.MapPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class MapPanel
extends java.awt.Panel
    Panel descendant used to display a Map contains most of graphics redraw logic also some animation/explosion handling TODO this redraws the entire screen all the time (besides my background hack), this needs to be totally redesign into a modern UI like that from MegaMek.
    Author:
    Tyrant, alex
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
